name: Calculate Hours PAGA FAT Procedure
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA FAT Procedure:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>)+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Universal_Interface_Modules_(UIM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Speakers)*>)*0.1)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>)+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Universal_Interface_Modules_(UIM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Speakers)*>)*0.1)) *>*0.5) *>}{<* Eval(<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>)+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Universal_Interface_Modules_(UIM))*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Speakers)*>)*0.1)) *>*0.5*1.15) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
